example.eg: A lot of things have happened since last year.
example.egtrans: 从去年以来发生了很多事情。

example.eg: I didn't work hard for it, it just happened!
example.egtrans: 我并没有刻意去做，只是碰巧了而已！

trans_examp.trans_cn: 发生在...身上, 降临在...身上

example.eg: What happened to that book I lent you?
example.egtrans: 我借你的那本书怎么了？

example.eg: Whilst in town, I happened by a photographic store and bought myself a new digicam.
I happened on an interesting article about Cuba in the newspaper.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 偶然发现, 偶然遇到

example.eg: You want me to give you money?  That's not about to happen.
We weren't trying to get pregnant; it happened by chance.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 碰巧发生, 凑巧发生

example.eg: Would that happen to be the book I've been searching for?

trans_examp.trans_cn: 碰巧, 恰巧, 正巧

example.eg: Did you happen to see my keys?
example.egtrans: 你有没有碰巧看到我的钥匙？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 正好做某事, 碰巧做某事

example.eg: I called a plumber, who just so happened to be in the area and came immediately to fix my sink.

dsense.name: just so happen, just so happen that

example.eg: I had the original idea, but you made it happen.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 使某事成为现实，使之成真

example.eg: I want to become friends with Burt--he's a guy who makes things happen.
It so happened that the house Goldilocks had wandered into belonged to three bears.
It doesn't just happen.  You need to will it to happen.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 凭意志的力量驱使, 通过强烈地希望来促成
